Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Tenant types, schedules, multi-car elevators

- Add apartment \($15k, green\) and retail \($25k, orange\) tenant types
- Offices are now blue colored for visual distinction
- Implement tenant schedules creating rush hours:
  - Office workers: arrive 8-9am, leave 5-6pm
  - Apartment residents: leave 7-9am, return 6-9pm
  - Retail customers: throughout day, peak at lunch
- Retail restricted to lobby or floor 1
- Rent collection includes all tenant types with satisfaction multiplier
- Multiple elevator cars per shaft \($10k per additional car\)
- Smart dispatching sends nearest available car
- Cars can pass through each other \(no collision\)
- Car count displayed at top of each shaft
- Each car has unique color tint and number label
- Fix camera limits for 100+ floor scrolling
- Constrain elevators to floor bounds

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
